text: 3.14: Mt 27.15-23; Mk 15.6-14; Ru 23.13-23; Zo 19.12-15Mba guma, ana guigira Fhe Bakɨmen piin ki guma ma. Ana guigira guman ŋaar ma, ana vhɨra tɨvir vhuuiŋra mbui guma ma. Nde ana thav, ana shashagiap, kɨr ana segap, Pairat ga nzuaim, ana harigi guma fhɨrgim, ana nde han vugi. Mba Pairat fhɨrgim, nde han vugi guma, ana guma shogi ana rimgi guma ma.
